remarks.para: The Data Common class contains static data helper methods.

GetConnectionType.summary: Retrieves the database connection DatabaseType value.

SetTableMapping.summary: Sets the data adapter table mappings.

SetTableMappingMySql.summary: Sets the data adapter table mappings.

GetDbDate.summary: Converts the date string to a DateTime value.
GetDbDate.returns: The DataTime value or MinValue if empty.

GetDbDateTime.summary: Converts the date string to a DateTime value.
GetDbDateTime.returns: The DataTime value or MinValue if empty.

GetDbDateString.summary: Formats the DateTime value to a date string in database format.

GetDbDateTimeString.summary: Formats the DateTime value to a date/time string in database format.

GetMinUIDateTimeString.summary: Get the minimum date/time string formatted for display.
GetMinUIDateTimeString.returns: The minimum value in display format.

GetUIDateString.summary: Format the date value for display.
GetUIDateString.returns: The date only string or null if not > MinValue.

GetUIDateTimeString.summary: Format the date/time value for display.
GetUIDateTimeString.returns: The date and time string or null if not > MinValue.

GetUITimeString.summary: Format the date/time to time for display.
GetUITimeString.returns: The time string or null if not > MinValue.

IsDbMinDate.summary: Checks for DB Minimum date or less.
